section_title: DATE AND VENUE OF COP 14 AND COP 15:
sentences: The COP adopted a decision accepting Poland's offer to host the COP 14 and COP/MOP 4 from 1-12 December 2008, in Poznan.
The COP also adopted a decision accepting Denmark's offer to host COP 15 and COP/MOP 5 in Copenhagen from 30 November to 11 December 2009.
The COP also requested the Executive Secretary to continue consultations with the Polish and Danish Governments with a view to finalizing Host Country Agreements (FCCC/SBI/2007/15/Add.1).
enb_long_title: United Nations Climate Change Conference - Bali
